name: Bonfire 🔥
description:
• Colin Bellino: programming, art, design (https://twitter.com/colinbellino)
  • Romain Huc: programming, audio, design (huc.romain@gmail.com)
Words from us
  • Romain Huc: Third Ludum Dare and second finished game !! Hourray ! I was a pleasure to make Bonfire. Great idea, some fancy music experience ( yeah testing Computer/Ai generated music was something ), good visuals, and burning (lot of) trees has something oddly satisfying. I’m fine with the result, it exceed my expectations !
  • Colin Bellino: This was felt good from the beginning. I had fun with the theme and the art and we had time for a polish phase at the end because the gameplay loop was so simple. I wish we had time to make more levels though :o
Tools used
  • Unity (game engine): https://unity3d.com/
  • Aseprite (pixel art): https://www.aseprite.org/
  • Streamlab (streaming): https://streamlabs.com/
  • SFRX (sound effects generator): http://www.drpetter.se/project_sfxr.html
  • Odin inpector (inspector tool for unity): https://odininspector.com/
  • Stateless (state machine c#): https://github.com/dotnet-state-machine/stateless
  • Wolfram (music): http://tones.wolfram.com
  • BitPotion (font): https://joebrogers.itch.io/bitpotion
